comment.author: 103405902@N02
comment._content: My son just started in the Navy, so shared your photo with him, thought it would let him see how things used to be before all this technology. Great photos!

comment.author: 43688219@N00
comment._content: Looks like HMS Kelly spent three periods in the shipyard - once as a result of storm damage, the second as a result of hitting a mine and the third following a torpedo attack by E-boats. www.naval-history.net/xGM-Chrono-10DD-38K-Kelly.htm
